name: Salomon Warden MNC 13 Bindings - Unisex
description: Move seamlessly between groomers and the back-bowl on one set of bindings. Compatible with all sole types, the Warden MNC 13 Bindings have crossover appeal if you venture out for some sidecountry snacking. Their unique toe design gives them precise handling, and the generous platform offers up solid power transfer for driving big fat skis.U Power Toe provides precise and powerful steering in deep snow or hardpack.Oversized platform offers an excellent responsiveness on even the widest skis.Progressive transfer pads provide shock absorption and cushioning.Heel flex interface results in a natural feeling degree of flex.Sliding pedal is designed to increase security with touring boots.Stack height is 24mm.Works with DIN, Touring and WTR boot sole types.
